players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Charlie's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious yet?"
You: "I didn't see anything suspicious yet, but we should all share our thoughts carefully."
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I believe Bob is the mafioso trying to frame Diana. His fake claim doesn't add up."
Diana: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. Alice makes a good point - why should we trust you're the detective and not the mafioso trying to eliminate a villager?"
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I'm the detective and my investigation result is clear. Don't fall for her deception."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
